channel.title: Possessor wins VS MM even when he is poisoned
channel.description:
#### What happened? 3 players remained: Possessor, Assasin and MM. Possessor had already used body jump. Assasin poisoned Possessor at day, then at night Possessor kills Assasin. Possessor immediately wins.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Since Possessor was poisoned, he would die after next night and Unseen would win since Possessor can't kill MM.
#### Steps to reproduce: Read above.
#### Comments: I know that Possessor VS MM is considered as win for Possessor since he has low winrate, but when he is poisoned that should be clear win for Unseen.
